channel.title: Making java's memory larger?
channel.description: [glow=blue,2,300]Im getting a java.lang.outofmemory exception when people try to connect, it means Its taking up more then 64mb which is the defualt max allowance that java allows, How do I change it to 256mb? I forget where to go to allow more memory to be used, anyone help?[/glow]
